name: continuous granny square shrug
notes: did you know you can crochet a shrug from a regular o'll granny square? with this pattern, you'll learn how to crochet this continuous granny square motif and how to seam it into a cozy cocoon cardigan. beginner friendly is the name of the game with this cardigan pattern. if you've never crocheted a wearable garment before, this is a great one to start with! there's even a helpful video tutorial for visual learners.
